overview: Jodi Kahn has been Executive VP at iVillage Networks since October, 2008. Before starting at iVillage, Kahn was President, Global Digital Media for Readers Digest Association, Inc., where she is credited with building digital businesses across the company. She developed multiplatform strategies, oversaw key site launches, led global digital expansion and the creation of an extensive digital content repository to grow audiences, revenue and profits. Prior, at Time Inc., Kahn led Time for Kids and was VP of Time Inc. Interactive for 3 years where she led the integration of Time Inc. web properties and AOL. Kahn has also held Marketing roles at Time and Sony.
